events.title: PTCL Privatization
events.description: Etisalat acquires 26% stake for $2.6 billion, marking the beginning of market liberalization
events.impact: Opened Pakistan's telecom market to international investment and competition

events.title: PTCL EVO Network Launch
events.description: Pakistan's first major 3G deployment providing wireless broadband access
events.impact: Introduced concept of mobile internet to Pakistani consumers

events.title: IMEWE Submarine Cable
events.description: International cable system enters service with 3.84 Tbps capacity
events.impact: Dramatically improved Pakistan's international internet connectivity

events.title: Historic 3G/4G Launch
events.description: Simultaneous launch by all major operators after spectrum auction
events.impact: Revolutionary moment that enabled smartphone adoption and mobile internet boom

events.title: 3G/4G Spectrum Auction
events.description: Historic simultaneous launch by Jazz, Telenor, Zong, and Ufone
events.impact: Enabled smartphone revolution and mobile internet adoption

events.title: Digital Pakistan Policy Launch
events.description: $20 billion ICT sector target by 2025 with comprehensive digitization strategy
events.impact: Structured approach to digital transformation with measurable goals

events.title: COVID-19 Digital Acceleration
events.description: Pandemic accelerated digital adoption with TeleSchool reaching 6 million children weekly
events.impact: 19% increase in internet users, permanent shift to digital services

socialMediaGrowth.note: Controversial but popular short-form video platform

events.title: RAAST Launch
events.description: Pakistan's instant payment system launches with real-time transaction processing
events.impact: 1.5 billion transactions, Rs34+ trillion value processed since launch

events.title: PEACE and SEA-ME-WE 6 Cables
events.description: New submarine cables operational providing 200+ Tbps international capacity
events.impact: Enhanced Pakistan's connectivity infrastructure for 5G era

events.title: Year of 5G Declaration
events.description: Commercial 5G launch planned for June-July with 1.5 Gbps speeds achieved in testing

mobileBanking.description: 1 in 4 adult Pakistanis, handles 9% of GDP

fiveGFuture.regionalFirst: Pakistan became first South Asian country to test 5G (August 2019)
